summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing National debt in billion U.S. dollars, with a total of 11 data points.
Overall National debt in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

National debt in billion U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2014 to 2017, slightly increasing from 2017 to 2018, slightly decreasing from 2018 to 2019, roughly increasing from 2019 to 2021, roughly constant from 2021 to 2022, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2022 to 2024.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.

Min National debt in billion U.S. dollars about 220.87 was recorded at Year 2016
